The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 September is 343,655 (610.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 September, there were 19,637 new confirmed cases (34.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 September, there were 19,207 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% (430 extra cases).
